channel.title: Download help
channel.description:
So I have been trying to download the Blackmesa Source files from all of the officials mirrors but my University's internet always flags it as a virus. My university is known for having pretty draconian internet policies, I cannot use any proxies or torrents.
Do you guys have any suggestions on how I could get a hold of the necessary files?
I was contemplating studying at a Starbucks over the weekend and try and download it there but I don't know how long that would take.

item.title: Download help
item.dc:creator: Ryan82593
item.description:
Hubicorn:

Have you tried the GameFront mirror?
https://www.gamefront.com/black-mesa-is-live-download-it-here/

Now it is working, I tried that before and it didn’t work. I think it is working now since I am using my university’s wireless at the library instead of at my dorm. I guess the dorm internet has stricter policies (even though they have the same name).

Read full topic
